name: ecomm-x-backend

scripts.test: (pg_isready || brew services start postgresql) && cross-env NODE_ENV=test jest --testTimeout=5000 --runInBand && brew services stop postgresql
scripts.knex:seed: npm run build && knex seed:run --env test
scripts.knex:migrate: npm run build && knex migrate:latest --env test

author: Christian Dezha <dezhac6@gmail.com> (https://christiandezha.com/)
description: Backend REST API for e-commerce site X
